trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_SEQ_00<tab>Regitt needs a tank commander for an extended trial.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_TODO_01<tab>Pilot the Rolling Tankard to the Stay and fire its cannon at the target dummies.
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_REGITT_000_000<tab>I, ah, I know this is short notice and all, but...have you got time to help us with an extended trial?
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_REGITT_000_001<tab>The bloke we trained to command the tank is, uh, “indisposed” at the moment, and no one else is willing or able to take the wheel. As it were.
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_REGITT_000_002<tab>Please, speak with Wamutt, and he'll brief you on the particulars. You're all we've got, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_WAMUTT_000_010<tab>You're our stand-in? Good, then we can get started!
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_WAMUTT_000_011<tab>There's naught to it really: just drive up to the Stay, then blast all the targets with the cannon. Commence trial!
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_WAMUTT_000_020<tab>You see, “commence trial” means “bloody go!” Try not to miss any of them dummies.

TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>A group of crude wooden dummies awaits obliteration... Speak to Wamutt at Watts's Anvil to pilot a Rolling Tankard, then command its main cannon to fire upon the targets.
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_REGITT_000_040<tab>The trial went well, then? Targets blown into sufficiently small chunks and all that? Good to hear!
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_REGITT_000_041<tab>Our original pilot stumbled in after a few too many mugs, and I couldn't let him near a tank in that condition. There'll be no drinking and firing on my watch!
TEXT_BANDWA128_03929_REGITT_000_042<tab>Anyway, I'm happy to say we've kept to our testing schedule, and it's all thanks to you!
